description: Information about the originator of the transaction.

originatorPersons.description: Information about the originator of the transaction

primaryIdentifier.description: The primary identifier of the name

secondaryIdentifier.description: The secondary identifier of the name

nameIdentifierType.description: Specifies the type of name for a natural person. Acceptable values are: - 'ALIA': Alias name, a name other than the legal name by which a natural person is also known. - 'BIRT': Name at birth, the name given to a natural person at birth. - 'MAID': Maiden name, the original name of a natural person who has changed their name after marriage. - 'LEGL': Legal name, the name that identifies a natural person for legal, official, or administrative purposes. - 'MISC': Unspecified, a name by which a natural person may be known but cannot otherwise be categorized.

name.description: An array of structured name identifiers for the natural person, referencing the TravelRuleNaturalPersonNameIdentifier schema.

streetName.description: Name of a street or thoroughfare

townName.description: Name of a built-up area, with defined boundaries, and a local government

country.description: Nation with its own government (ISO-3166 Alpha-2 country code)

postCode.description: Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail

addressType.description: Specifies the type of address. Acceptable values are: - 'HOME': Residential, the home address - 'BIZZ': Business, the business address - 'GEOG': Geographic, an unspecified physical (geographical) address

nationalIdentification.description: Represents a national identifier for a person or entity

countryOfIssue.description: Country that issued the national identifier (ISO-3166 Alpha-2 country code)

nationalIdentifierType.description: Type of national identifier. Acceptable values include: - 'PASSPORT': Passport number - 'NATIONAL_ID': National identification number - 'TAX_ID': Tax identification number - 'SOCIAL_SECURITY': Social security number
